author: user
content: Dear Jonathan We were absolutely thrilled to see your recent review of our product on Instagram thank you so much for such a thoughtful and beautifully made video! The quality and creativity of your reel were truly outstanding, and we feel it would resonate deeply with a wider audience. With your kind permission, we d love to repost your video clearly crediting you as the original creator across our official TikTok, YouTube Shorts, and Instagram Reels channels. If possible, could you kindly share the video file via email for optimal quality? Thank you once again for your support it means a lot to us. Looking forward to hearing from you! Warm regards, BlackVue Marketing team Jewon Moon
